body.name: Seventh Generation Baby Diapers for Sensitive Skin, Animal Prints, Size 5, 23 Count

features: Weight Recommendation: 27 to 35 Pounds. Free & Clear baby diapers made for your baby’s sensitive skin.
Ultra-absorbent, high capacity core provides premium leak protection to keep baby’s skin protected and dry.
Hypoallergenic, free from lotions and fragrances, and the core of our diaper is free from chlorine bleaching.
The wood pulp in the core of our diapers is sustainably sourced and FSC certified, helping to protect the world’s forests and the animals who depend on them. FSC C115279
The animals featured on our diapers rely on the forests our diapers help to protect; the inks we use on our diapers are free from lead and other heavy metals.
body.description: Your baby deserves a fresh, clean start each day. And you deserve to know that these safe and effective diapers will help keep your baby’s sensitive skin protected and dry. Seventh Generation diapers have an ultra-absorbent core that prevents leaks and is made with 0% chlorine bleaching, fragrances or lotions. We design our diapers to care for your baby as well as the health of the next seven generations.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #14,780 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby) #124 in Disposable Diapers

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ABOUT US : For the past 30 years, we’ve been a company with strong beliefs about the rights of people and planet. At Seventh Generation, we believe in future generations. In fact, we think about them every day. In our every decision, we think about our impact on the generations to come. We believe our products are healthy solutions for your home, and for the community and environment outside of it. As a pioneer in corporate responsibility, we consider our impact in everything we do—from product development through production, purchase, use, and disposal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for really sensative skin
reviews.reviewText: These are the only diapers are amazing when it comes to keeping my girls safe and healthy! I do find that with my two year old (who is on potty strike) they leak...she does know how to hold her potty so thinking it is just because when she goes she really goes..lolI get lots if compliments on the designs as well.The big decision maker for me compared to other natural diapers was when i tried the other brands my daughter would break out..she has such sensative skin so i love that she has no problems with these diapers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I bought these due to a heat rash on my toddlers bottom while using buggies. These were for sensitive skin and lightweight. They are so thin that I didn’t think they would be able to contain everything. We have had one leak and that could have been user error. They are light weight and his heat rash has since cleared up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe, natural, and quality diapers!
reviews.reviewText: This was my first time buying natural diapers and I couldn’t be more pleased. I had used Luvs, Pampers, and Huggiss in the past. However, I decided I didn’t want my babies exposed to the chemicals in those other brands anymore. I love how thin these diapers are and how well they fit my girls. They are also very flexible allowing my baby to crawl comfortably and my toddler to run freely. I was far more impressed than expected! I will keep buying these and recommend to everyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2016
reviews.reviewText: Why are the sensitive ones so much smaller than the regular ones???

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these diapers
reviews.reviewText: Love these diapers! We have been a Huggies only family for years, until now. The design was SO cute, they are actually really good quality, no dyes or harmful ingredients. The only difference I have found is that these diapers are thinner than our normal Huggies — my son is one that will wet through his diaper half-way throughout the night. So far so good with no accidents!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worst diapers I've used
reviews.reviewText: I've used Seventh Generation diapers on my daughter for close to two years and had zero issues. She only wears diapers at night, and sleeps a solid 12 hours, but I've never experienced leaks or anything. I moved her to these size 5's and they are trash. I've used the "nonprinted" diapers many times previously, but these are like thin cheap paper. When I got her up in the morning, the pee had collected in a ball between her legs that she could literally shake back and forth...not to mention she had pee all over her jammies. So needless to say, these diapers are awesome until you get to size 5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Dollar store quality just with no bleach or design
reviews.reviewText: These have got to be The worst diapers I’ve ever bought and that includes storebrand I thought that it being really price around the same as pampers but also stating they don’t use some of the chemicals that other name brands do you was worth a try they could’ve at least tried to make the diapers look appealing they also I have very Then absorbency you might as well go b then absorbency you might as well go by loves or your local dollar store brand buy luvs or ur local dollar store brand at least u won’t pay as much And honestly in my opinion luvs are better quality than this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Like the brand; not as leak proof
reviews.reviewText: We bought this brand to help battle some rashes baby has had lately. The diaper itself worked in decreasing frequency and severity of rashes, but leaked more than Pamper and Huggies brands. For the cost, I wish the leaking wouldn't happen.
Doesn't hold a lot, but gentle on the skin.
